newsitem.title: UK: RUGBY LEAGUE-BRADFORD BEAT LONDON IN CHALLENGE CUP.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY LEAGUE-BRADFORD BEAT LONDON IN CHALLENGE CUP.

text.p: Bradford beat London 34-12 (halftime 10-2) in a Challenge Cup fifth round match on Saturday.
London - Tries: Krause, Roskell. Goals: Barwick (2)
Bradford - Tries: Nickle (2), Cook, Loughlin, Paul, Tomlinson. Goals: McNamara (5).
